SceneStart: ^You run into Jensen grabbing a coffee. He sees you and gives you a quick wave, but looks down at the floor.

c-1: ^You run into Jensen grabbing a coffee. He sees you and looks back down at the floor quickly.
c-3: ^You run into Jensen grabbing a coffee. He sees you, grimaces, and then looks down at the floor.

AreYouDoingOkay: ^Jensen: "Not really no. Ever since Ned removed me from the lab meetings, all of my applications have gone about how I suspected them to. I appreciate your effort to help me though Bronislav, I really do."
HopeThingsGetBetter: ^Bronislav: "Sorry with how everything turned out Jensen. I hope things get better for you, and you keep putting in work."
^You reach out your hand, and he shakes it firmly.
^Jensen: "I hope your paper turns out well Bronislav, I'll see you when I see you."
SeeYouLater: ^Bronislav: "I'll see you later Jensen, whenever that is."
^You walk out of the cafe, waving goodbye and Jensen waves back.
CantBlameThem: ^Bronislav: "I can't say I blame them Jensen. Sorry, but, that's life. Hopefully you learn from this."
^Jensen: "Yeah, thanks Bronislav..." He says begrudgingly as he takes his coffee and leaves quickly.
HowAreYou: ^Jensen: "I'm not doing the best Bronislav. My application is getting denied everywhere even with the paper. It really, really sucks."
CanWeTalk: ^Jensen: "There isn't much to talk about Bronislav. My application is getting me nowhere ever since Ned removed me from the lab meetings, and I'm just really frustrated."
LeaveYouAlone: ^Bronislav: "I'll just leave you alone then. Hope you have a good rest of your day."
WeShouldHaveExpected: ^Bronislav: "We really should have expected this Jensen. I should've trusted me intuition to stay away from this."
^Jensen: "Not like we can change it now, my application is getting declined everywhere anyway. I just need to take a break I think."
^He walks out of the cafe without another word, or wave.
^When you go to look for a seat at the student cubicles you see Jensen typing away at his laptop.
^He looks up and notices you as well, waving at you.
^"Now you want to put in the work."
WhatAreYouUpTo: ^Bronislav: "Hey Jensen, what are you up to?"
^Jensen: "Well I've been doing some coursework and I've been talking some more with Ivy. Nothing bad, just about getting more experience so I could actually get on a paper on my own merit."
^"Now you want to put in the work."
ThatsGreat: ^Bronislav: "Wow! That's great to hear Jensen, determination is a good quality to have. I'm sure you'll find something, if not work on your own paper."
^He seems surprised, and happy to hear you say this.
^Jensen: "Really Bronislav? You think so? Well, I'd have to thank you for giving me the determination to work harder."
^He takes a sip of some coffee.
^Jennsen: "Alright, while I'd love to talk more I do need to finish this work for class, so I'll see you later Bronislav."
NowYouPutInTheWork: ^You laugh a bit at him saying this.
^Bronislav: "Oh, so now you want to put in the work Jensen?"
^He shuffles in his seat, and is upset to hear you say this.
^Jensen: "I mean I've got to at some point right Bronislav? How else can I impress someone as prestigious as yourself."
^He says prestigious in a mocking way.
^Jensen: "Well I've got to do my work now, I'll see you later Bronislav."
^He waves you goodbye before you can get another word out.
